quests.name: Discover the Hub
quests.description: Find the first community hub and solve the puzzle.
quests.location: Located in the downtown district near the main conference center.
quests.puzzle: Find the QR code at the community hub and solve the riddle to get the codeword.

quests.name: The Hidden Message
quests.description: Decode the message at the second community hub.
quests.location: Look for the building with the distinctive architecture in the tech quarter.
quests.puzzle: Use the cipher wheel at the hub to decode the hidden message.

quests.name: Journey's End
quests.description: Complete the final quest and claim your treasure.
quests.location: Return to where your journey began, but look closer this time.
quests.puzzle: Combine all the clues from previous quests to solve the final puzzle.
